title: SignalK update message schema
description: Schema for communicating updates to parts of a SignalK data model

context.description: The context path of the updates, eg. the top level path plus object identifier.

get.description: A websockets equivalent to a REST GET request.This is for one-off requests, use the subscribe message for regular changes.

path.description: The relative path to GET,  supports jsonPath syntax for complex matches

list.description: Optional. Gets a list of known keys for this path

path.description: The relative path to list keys for,  supports jsonPath syntax for complex matches

put.description: A websockets equivalent to a REST PUT request. This is for one-off changes, use the updates message for regular changes.

value.description: The value to set at the path
